    Ridgeline plots grouped by an attribute.

    ridgeline.Rd

    Plots ridgeline plots grouped by latitude/longitude or time.

    ridgeline(
  x,
  group_col,
  z_col,
  num_grps = 10,
  xlab = "Value",
  ylab = "Group Intervals",
  title = "",
  legend_title = "z"
)

    Arguments

    x

    A stars object or a dataframe. Arguments differ according to the input type.

    group_col

    The column name of the group column.

    z_col

    The The quantity of interest that will be plotted. Eg. temperature.

    num_grps

    The number of levels for the ridgeline plot.

    xlab

    The x label.

    ylab

    The y label.

    title

    The graph title.

    legend_title

    The title for the legend.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
data(NOAA_df_1990)
TmaxJan <- filter(NOAA_df_1990,
                 proc == "Tmax" &
                 year == 1993 &
                 month == 1)
ridgeline(TmaxJan,
      group_col = 'lat',
      z_col = 'z',
      xlab = 'Maximum Temperature',
      ylab = 'Latitude Intervals')
#> Picking joint bandwidth of 2.62
